attributes.action: Cancel 10 days quarantine for anyone who had COVID in last 180 days
attributes.additional_details: Government have to consider human rights and that everyone can make their own decisions. Vaccinated people can get covid and also can pass to others exactly the same as non vaccinated. People who had covid in last 180 days will have antibodies. Please consider stand for every human rights not just vaccinated.
attributes.background: Cancel 10 days quarantine on arrival in UK for those who had covid in last 180 days but had no vaccination.As longest PCR taken 48h before arrival shows negative results and still follow day 2 and day 8 tests.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Abolish quarantine requirements when entering the UK from a non-red list country
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/601594

If you would like to start another petition, you will need to give your full name.
